actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To amend the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to require recordkeeping and authorize investigations and enforcement actions for violations of such Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to require all persons, including producers, handlers, and certifying agents, required to report information to the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) under such Act to maintain all contracts, agreements, receipts, and other records associated with the organic certification program for 5 years (10 years for a certifying agent). Authorizes investigative and enforcement actions for violations of such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to require recordkeeping and authorize investigations and enforcement actions for violations of such Act, and for other purposes.
